summary: Three requested followers 2 females and 1 male.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5]DX Followers[/size]

[img]https://s7.postimg.cc/44oxs4lp7/image.jpg[/img]﻿
[size=5]Elisha Sabine:[/size] [size=4]Was born 4E 180 to Breton merchants in the city-state of Jehenna, in the northeast of High Rock. Her parents would travel with her annually to Skyrim to purchase supplies. When she was 14 her parent were killed by bandits near the famous Skyrim town of Dragon Bridge, a small community located on the Karth River and between the cities of
Solitude and Markarth. She was rescued by Imperial agents stationed at the Penitus Oculatus Outpost. They brought her to Solitude were she was taken in by Angeline Morrard the Breton owner of Angeline's Aromatics.  She was raised along with Angeline's daughter Fura and her niece Vivienne Onis. At age 18 Elisha returned to High Rock to join the Fighter's Guild in Jehenna.  After completing her studies in 4E 201, she returned to Skyrim to visit Angeline Morrard and her family.

Race: Breton
Voice: Young eager
Marriageable: Yes
Weight: 60
Body: UNP
 
Class: Combat Ranger
Levels with player.
Spells: Healing
Perks: deadlyaim, overdraw, quickshot, stealth, agiledefender, powershot, quickhands, deftmovement, ranger, oblivionbinding, dualsavagery, dualfurry

[b][size=5]Location: Sleeping Giant Inn[/size][/b][/size]

[img]https://s7.postimg.cc/rvoba91bv/image.jpg[/img]﻿
 
[size=5]Nathan Hawke:[/size][size=4] Was born 4E 174 to a Nord father and a Redguard mother in the Skyrim Hold of Falkreach. By the time he was 16 his parents had died due to an epidemic of an infectious disease. Nathan left Skyrim for Cyrodiil, where he joined the Bruma Fighter'sGuild. He returned to Skyrim and was living in Whiterun.

Race: RedGuard
Voice: MaleBrute
Marriageable: Yes
Weight: 90
Class: CombatWarrior2H
Levels with player.
Spells: Healing
Perks: Barbarian, championsstance, deepwounds, skullcrusher, devastatingblow, greatcriticalcharge, limbsplitter

[b][size=5]Location: Drunken Huntsman [/size][/b][/size]

[img]https://s7.postimg.cc/gjbpsh0cr/image.jpg[/img]﻿
 
[size=5]Rhiannon Samir:[size=4] A Redguard who was born inHammerfell in 4E 182. Rhiannon left Hammerfall to journey to Skyrim as a mystical vision revealed that a great warrior would be coming to Skyrim and would need her aid. She believed that this individual would come to be Tamriel's most important figure.
Race: RedGuard
Voice: Sultry
Marriageable: Yes
Body: UNP
Weight: 60
Class: Combat Spellsword
Levels with player.
Spells: Healing, fireball, firebolt, Lightingbolt, sparks
Perks: agiledefender, customfit, unhindered, windwalker, respite,renegeration,armsman, fightingsdtance,bladesman,criticalcharge, destruction, argumentedflames, intenseflames

[b][size=5]Location: Bannered Mare[/size][/b]
 
 [size=5][size=4]Screenshots are appreciated!
If you have any questions/request pm me! :)[/size]
Recommended
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]Facelight[/url][/size]
 
 
 
 
[size=5]Credits[/size]
